about_the_game:
Use in world crafting to upgrade your weapons as you save your coven using the Necromantic Ritual. Your coven has been turned into Jar Heads to be harvested for their magical powers. 

Use cauldron to craft new weapons, keys, and tools that will help you complete the Necromantic ritual and save your coven. 

Fight undead and occult monsters from the other side that will keep you from your mission to save your coven.

Crafting involves an in world cauldron crafting/cooking system. Every craft will require three items dropped into the cauldron. 

The Necromatic ritual will require you to gather the required skulls, body parts and Jar Head to save them.
detailed_description:
Use in world crafting to upgrade your weapons as you save your coven using the Necromantic Ritual. Your coven has been turned into Jar Heads to be harvested for their magical powers. 

Use cauldron to craft new weapons, keys, and tools that will help you complete the Necromantic ritual and save your coven. 

Fight undead and occult monsters from the other side that will keep you from your mission to save your coven.

Crafting involves an in world cauldron crafting/cooking system. Every craft will require three items dropped into the cauldron. 

The Necromatic ritual will require you to gather the required skulls, body parts and Jar Head to save them.
name: Jar Head Cauldron Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 945A
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060
  • Storage: 25 MB available space

short_description: Use in world crafting to upgrade weapons and save your coven from being Jar Heads forever! You must assemble new bodies for your coven and gather the required body parts to put them back together will those on the other side will keep you from you mission!
